body:
CALL IT!!, Lapis will take control and become demon lord himself.
If not, pls don't anal fist him in the next episode or something like that.

I'm honestly hoping Satou-san will flip their usual conventions and have Mary end up the one in power, rather than the usual subservience ending that Satou-san does. She still has her "origin", it's just been corrupted. Here's hoping she exorcises Lord Elysium, takes on Lapis as her right hand man/woman/whatever (jury still out on what's going to happen to them, though the concept art hints at the possibilities), Ravana as her left and the world her playground.
Legit read this for the story

This is the best, I really love it....  I want too see Lapis broken and corrupt become Lord Elysium servant... Jeez this is the best, I hope the next chapter will come out soon.... Even though it's still in Japanese :)

when the next chapter will come 
any one
According to his color page and artist , i'm sure Lapis will corrupt too
I wonder how long this will last.
